name: Leaping AI
headline: Voice AI agents that are human-like and self-improve
description:
With our platform, you can create and deploy voice AI agents, automating complex use cases and high call volume.

We automated contact centers employing >100 human agents and now handle 70% of their incoming customer support and sales calls end-to-end. All while maintaining 90% customer satisfaction score.

For another company, our voice AI agents were able to convert 30% of contacted leads within a week of the outbound campaign. A similar campaign with humans previously took that same company 5 weeks.

founders.name: Shraey Bhatia, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Leaping AI (W25). We are building a next-gen CCaaS solution centered around LLM Voice AI agents. Previously PhD in NLP/LLMs from University of Melbourne

founders.name: Arkadiy Telegin, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder at Leaping AI (W25). We are building a next-gen CCaaS solution centered around LLM Voice AI agents. Previously worked in autonomous robotics (self-driving cars, space-tech, and consumer applications). Led Germany's largest space-tech student organization's software division.

founders.name: Kevin Wu, Founder
founders.description: Founder at Leaping AI, which is focused on automating contact centers with a platform that allows the deployment of human-like and self-improving Voice AI agents. Formerly was an Associate at BCG for 3 years. Studied Computer Science at TU Munich and at CDTM.

Features
## 
#1
Voice
AI
platform
### Human-like conversations
Leaping AI builds on the latest state-of-the-art Gen AI technology to deliver ultimate flexibility and human-like customer experiences
### 70% automation rate
Develop intelligent AI contact center agents using our platform and automate up to 70% of incoming calls without any human intervention
### Multi-channel
Next to voice, Leaping AI can also automate your email- and chatbot based customer service requests, ensuring all of your customer communication is managed by the same system.
### Outbound campaigns
Reach out to warm leads and schedule 1000s of calls at the same time with the click of a button. Past campaigns we ran had 30% conversion rates
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/66c4854a57225481f4ba26fd/66c8fbb63475b9d689f1b369_tab-image-01.avif)

FAQ
## 
Frequently
asked
Questions
### Is your solution compliant with regulations in both the EU and US?
Our solution fully complies with GDPR and CCPA regulations, ensuring data protection and privacy for both EU and US markets. Additionally, all our servers are securely hosted in the respective regions, providing localized support and compliance for customers in both the EU and US.
### How does your solution differentiate from others in the market?
Other solutions use outdated methods or are developer focused. Our platform makes it easy for non-technical businesses to deploy human-like and self-improving voice agents that can automate 70% of calls without human handover.
### Where is your company based?
Our company is based in Germany (Berlin) and the US (San Francisco).
### How much does your solution cost?
We try to design an individual price package depending on the use case and problem we solve. Please get in touch with us to get a pricing estimate.
### How do you make sure AI does not hallucinate?
Our system has different guardrails in place to ensure that the system does not demonstrate undesired behaviour.

FAQ
## 
Frequently
asked
Questions
### Is your solution compliant with regulations in both the EU and US?
Our solution fully complies with GDPR and CCPA regulations, ensuring data protection and privacy for both EU and US markets. Additionally, all our servers are securely hosted in the respective regions, providing localized support and compliance for customers in both the EU and US.
### How does your solution differentiate from others in the market?
Other solutions use outdated methods or are developer focused. Our platform makes it easy for non-technical businesses to deploy human-like and self-improving voice agents that can automate 70% of calls without human handover.
### Where is your company based?
Our company is based in Germany (Berlin) and the US (San Francisco).
### How much does your solution cost?
We try to design an individual price package depending on the use case and problem we solve. Please get in touch with us to get a pricing estimate.
### How do you make sure AI does not hallucinate?
Our system has different guardrails in place to ensure that the system does not demonstrate undesired behaviour.

generated_description:
**Leaping AI: A New Frontier in Voice Automation**

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's W25 batch, Leaping AI is making waves in the realm of voice-driven automation. Based in San Francisco, this small but mighty team of six is on a mission: to create human-like voice AI agents that can learn and improve over time. 

### What They Do

At its core, Leaping AI provides a platform for businesses to develop and deploy voice AI agents that handle complex customer interactions‚Äîfrom sales to customer support. They started by focusing on automating contact centers, where they've successfully replaced or streamlined the functions of over 100 human agents. The result? Their AI agents now manage an impressive 70% of incoming calls while maintaining a stellar 90% customer satisfaction rate. 

To illustrate their effectiveness, one of their clients saw a 30% conversion rate within just a week of launching an outbound campaign using Leaping AI agents. For context, a similar campaign with human agents would typically take five weeks to achieve the same results. That‚Äôs not just efficiency; that‚Äôs a game changer.

### Features and Benefits

Leaping AI distinguishes itself with several remarkable capabilities:
- **Human-like Conversations:** Utilizing cutting-edge generative AI technology, their voice agents deliver conversational experiences that feel natural and engaging.
- **Multi-channel Support:** Beyond just voice, their system can integrate email and chatbot interactions, streamlining customer communication across platforms.
- **Intuitive Tools for Businesses:** With a user-friendly drag-and-drop interface, building AI conversations doesn‚Äôt require a coding background. This makes the deployment process accessible for companies of all sizes.
- **Cost Efficiency:** Leveraging AI can lead to a significant reduction‚Äîup to 70%‚Äîin operational costs compared to human-operated systems.

### Looking Ahead

As they continue to innovate in areas like outbound campaigns and quality monitoring, Leaping AI is poised to serve not just retail but also sectors like telecommunications and business process outsourcing (BPO). Their commitment to compliance with regulations, such as GDPR and CCPA, ensures that they prioritize user data protection, making them appealing to enterprises concerned about privacy.

In summary, Leaping AI isn't just another tech startup; they're redefining how companies interact with their customers by enabling them to leap into a future powered by efficient, self-improving AI. For more details, visit their [website](https://leapingai.com).
